title: Episode #50: Is Social Media Making us Depressed?
description:
Is technology and social media bad for us and our brains?
In this podcast episode I discuss the good and the bad of social media, and how to make technology work for us and not against us.
Link for my book THINK LEARN SUCCEED: https://store.drleaf.com/collections/frontpage/products/think-learn-succeed-book
Link to register for my 2018 Conference: https://drleafconference.com
dc:creator: Dr. Caroline Leaf
